translations: [药][内科] 支气管扩张剂；支气管扩张器

sentences.sentence: Airway resistances can be improved by bronchodilator.
sentences.translation: 支气管扩张剂能改善气道阻力。

sentences.sentence: I will use the bronchodilator before I use the steroid inhaler.
sentences.translation: 我将先使用支气管扩张药物喷雾剂，在使用类固醇喷雾剂。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to study the effect of ambroxol as a bronchodilator on infants with wheezing disease.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究盐酸氨溴索对喘息小儿肺功能的影响。
